entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0102.9543] Résultat global with a value of 69,000,000 is not equal to the combined total of Résultat and Autres éléments du résultat global ( 112,000,000 + 43,000,000 ) with a value of 155,000,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncome fact are: Period :2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis=ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterestsMember Unit : EUR Decimals of Résultat global : -6 Decimals of Résultat : -6 Decimals of Autres éléments du résultat global : -6
Rule Element Id:9543 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/969500A1YF1XUYYXS284/2020-12-31/ESEF/FR/0/schneiderelectric-2020-12-31AR.zip/schneiderelectric-2020-12-31AR/reports/schneiderelectric-2020-12-31AR.xhtml 51600

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9609] It is expected that ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation with a value of -1,541,000,000 reported in the network role http://www.schneiderelectric.fr/xbrl/2020/roles/EtatDeLaSituationFinanciere should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationMember and a reported value of 1,541,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.schneiderelectric.fr/xbrl/2020/roles/EtatDesVariationsDesCapitauxPropres. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation : -6 Decimals of Equity : -6 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/969500A1YF1XUYYXS284/2020-12-31/ESEF/FR/0/schneiderelectric-2020-12-31AR.zip/schneiderelectric-2020-12-31AR/reports/schneiderelectric-2020-12-31AR.xhtml 51599
